short_summary: Collection, Transport and Disposal of Loose-Leaf Tobacco
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Collection, Transport and Disposal of Loose-Leaf Tobacco

**Procurement Reference:** cb-554-62293567
**Solicitation Number:** SPMD-24-TOBO/A

## Summary
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Seized Property Management Directorate (SPMD) seeks a supplier for the collection, transport, and disposal of loose-leaf tobacco, specifically hazardous waste, as outlined in this request for proposal (RFP). The initial contract period will be one (1) year, with a one-year option to renew at PSPC's discretion.

## Requirements and Deliverables
- Supplier must have a pre-approved supply arrangement (EW479-162880) to be considered for this opportunity.
- Work will be performed on an "As and When Requested" basis using task authorizations (TAs).
- The supplier must comply with provided Annex A, Appendix I, which outlines all three geographical regions for loose-leaf tobacco service request pickups.
- Suppliers may bid for one or multiple geographical regions.
- Multiple contracts can be awarded, one per each geographical region. PSPC will select the lowest cost responsive bid for each region.

## Key Specifications

- Estimated contract value: $399,999.00 (HST included), $353,982.30 (HST excluded)
- Coverage area: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

## Trade Agreements
- This RFP is subject to several international trade agreements, including:
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Contact Information

- Daphne Klassen-Hayes
  - Email: [daphne.klassen-hayes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.klassen-hayes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  - Phone: (613) 296-0230

## Document Attachments

[Link to tender documents and attachments in multiple file types](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/s/folder-and-file)

## Closing Date

The tender closing date is specified as May 13, 2024, at 14:30:00, after which this opportunity will be considered expired.
